macros.sourceContext:
> | {{HTMLSidebar}} ^ |

Certain HTML elements use date and/or time values. The formats of the strings that specify these values are described in this article.

|

Elements that use such formats include certain forms of the {{HTMLElement("input")}} element that let the user choose or specify a date, time, or both, as well as the {{HTMLElement("ins")}} and {{HTMLElement("del")}} elements, whose datetime attribute specifies the date or date and time at which the insertion or deletion of content occurred.

> | {{HTMLSidebar}} ^ |

Certain HTML elements use date and/or time values. The formats of the strings that specify these values are described in this article.

|

Elements that use such formats include certain forms of the {{HTMLElement("input")}} element that let the user choose or specify a date, time, or both, as well as the {{HTMLElement("ins")}} and {{HTMLElement("del")}} elements, whose datetime attribute specifies the date or date and time at which the insertion or deletion of content occurred.

title: Date and time formats used in HTML
summary: Certain HTML elements use date and/or time values. The formats of the strings that specify these values are described in this article.
